title: Resolve establishing a commission on infrastructure resilience

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Walsh of Peabody, a petition (accompanied by resolve, House, No. 3437) of Thomas P. Walsh for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to infrastructure resilience.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight
